headline.main: GERMAN LABOR NEED SEEN; Observers Believe Bulgarian Move Has Worker Angle

lead_paragraph: ANKARA, Turkey, Sept. 24 (AP) -- Enough evidence of a serious labor shortage in Germany is accumulating to indicate that her pressure on Bulgaria may be directed less at getting that nation into the war against Russia than at winning help in the war against lagging Axis production.
abstract: German demands on Bulgaria for troops linked to German labor shortage
